description: Follow your impulse. Made to handle a range of terrain, environments, and conditions, the Gamma Lightweight Hoody is an essential softshell for anyone seeking new experiences. Wind resistant and water repellent, the lightweight Fortius™ 1.0 softshell fabric stretches, breathes, provides UPF 50+ protection, and is made with 43% recycled content. The StormHood™ provides coverage and adjusts with a single pull, and the regular fit allows room for light layers and is patterned for freedom of movement.
name: Arcteryx Gamma Lightweight Hoody - Mens
